attributes.action: Create a no smoking law within 1 metre of the entrances or exits of any public buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People smoke right next to open doors and windows. It is disgusting and unhygenic. Laws should move people at least 1 metre away from the doors so that non-smokers, in particular children, do not have to pass through clouds of smoke to get in or out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
